lines.text: You know, Ollie, I been thinkin'!
Well, if we caught our own fish, then we wouldn't have to pay for it and whoever we sold it to, it would be clear profit.
Well, if we caught our own fish, then the people we sold it to wouldn't have to pay for it, the profit would go to the fish...

[Seeing Ollie covered with paint]
What did you put that stuff on your face for?
Put that hose back in that hole!
